section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:AbstractFactory
Abstract class for VM factory objects CoinsInserted_s
The CoinsInserted state Context_t
Context data for states Create_s
The Create state DataStore
The abstract datastore class for data storage DisposeAdditive_1
Concrete strategy class for VM1 DisposeAdditive function DisposeAdditive_2
Concrete strategy class for VM2 DisposeAdditive function DisposeAdditive_t
Abstract strategy class for DisposeAdditive function DisposeDrink_1
Concrete strategy class for VM1 DisposeDrink function DisposeDrink_2
Concrete strategy class for VM2 DisposeDrink function DisposeDrink_t
Abstract strategy class for DisposeDrink function DS_1
Datastore for VM 1 DS_2
Datastore for VM 2 Idle_s
The Idle state IncreaseCF_Float
Concrete strategy class for VM1 IncreaseCF function IncreaseCF_Int
Concrete strategy class for VM2 IncreaseCF function IncreaseCF_t
Abstract strategy class for IncreaseCF function MDA
Model Driven Architecture class This servers as the connection between VM and states NoCups_s
The NoCups state OP
The Output Processor receives actions from a state and uses the appropriate strategy ReturnCoins_Float
Concrete strategy class for VM1 ReturnCoins function ReturnCoins_Int
Concrete strategy class for VM2 ReturnCoins function ReturnCoins_t
Abstract strategy class for ReturnCoins function StorePrice_Float
Concrete strategy class for VM1 and VM2 StorePrice function StorePrice_Int
Concrete strategy class for StorePrice function StorePrice_t
Abstract strategy class for StorePrice function VM1
User Interface for VM1 VM1Factory
Concrete Factory for VM 1 VM2
User Interface for VM2 VM2Factory
Concrete Factory for VM 2 ZeroCF_Float
Concrete strategy class for VM1 ZeroCF function ZeroCF_Int
Concrete strategy class for VM2 ZeroCF function ZeroCF_t
Abstract strategy class for ZeroCF function
